testcase.name: Access to Index page
Create a Contact
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Create a Contact Given I open Contact List website ... passed in 4.873s When I access to create contact page ... passed in 0.524s And I create a new Contact with random values ... passed in 1.605s And I back to home page from a show contact page ... passed in 0.505s Then I verify that the count of Contacts is 1 ... passed in 0.017s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Edit a Contact
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Edit a Contact Given I open Contact List website ... passed in 4.156s When I verify that the count of Contacts is 1 ... passed in 0.016s And I go to edit one contact ... passed in 0.482s And I edit a current Contact with random values ... passed in 1.451s And I back to home page from a show contact page ... passed in 0.507s Then I verify that the count of Contacts is 1 ... passed in 0.010s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Delete a Contact
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Delete a Contact Given I open Contact List website ... passed in 4.142s When I verify that the count of Contacts is 1 ... passed in 0.022s And I delete one contact ... passed in 0.665s Then I verify that the count of Contacts is 0 ... passed in 0.746s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
